profile.bio: I am a software developer who enjoys and is curious about the field I have chosen in the software world which is Full-Stack Development. I feel ready and excited for the new and developing experiences I can gain by using the knowledge I have gained through the education I have received and the experiences I have gained. I am aware of the value I can add to the company I am in and I continue to improve myself in order to increase this value.

experience.description: During my internship, I played a key role in the success of the Eyecheckup Web project by developing the admin panel with React.js, enhancing functionality and user experience. I also contributed to backend optimization with Spring Boot, improving API performance and data management. Using technologies like Vue.js, jQuery, Tailwind, PostgreSQL, AWS.I enhanced system performance and scalability, streamlining internal processes and supporting seamless feature deployment.

During my internship, I developed a web-based application with Spring Boot, implementing a full CRUD system and writing RESTful APIs. I enhanced security by adding a protective layer, wrote unit tests to ensure code reliability, and used Swagger to automatically generate comprehensive API documentation.
